${ModID}:FlameBlessing.NAME: Flame Blessing
${ModID}:FlameBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each *Miracle in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FrostBlessing.NAME: Frost Blessing
${ModID}:FrostBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block for each *Miracle in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GaleBlessing.NAME: Gale Blessing
${ModID}:GaleBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} for each *Miracle in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Absolution.NAME: Absolution
${ModID}:Absolution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BanefulBlast.NAME: Baneful Blast
${ModID}:BanefulBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Corrupt.

${ModID}:BurdenBreaker.NAME: Burden Breaker
${ModID}:BurdenBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, Upgrade !M! random card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} in your hand.
${ModID}:BurdenBreaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, Upgrade !M! random card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} in your hand.

${ModID}:CrossCut.NAME: Cross Cut
${ModID}:CrossCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:CrossFormation.NAME: Cross Formation
${ModID}:CrossFormation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each *Miracle in your hand.

${ModID}:DangerClose.NAME: Danger Close
${ModID}:DangerClose.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
${ModID}:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DoubleBladed.NAME: Double Bladed
${ModID}:DoubleBladed.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack. NL Add !M! {@@}{!M!|1=copy|@=copies} of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EchoingHymn.NAME: Echoing Hymn
${ModID}:EchoingHymn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:EclipsePower.NAME: Eclipse Power
${ModID}:EclipsePower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the target's intent.

${ModID}:Espoir.NAME: Espoir
${ModID}:Espoir.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! of your debuffs.

${ModID}:EternalVoice.NAME: Eternal Voice
${ModID}:EternalVoice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Holy: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies again.

${ModID}:FallenForm.NAME: Fallen Form
${ModID}:FallenForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Void enters your hand, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|>3=!M! [E]} and Transform it. NL ${ModID}:Corrupt 3 times.

${ModID}:FlameWalker.NAME: Flame Walker
${ModID}:FlameWalker.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:M2! card{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s}. NL Add !M! *Flame *Blessing{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:FlashPoint.NAME: Flash Point
${ModID}:FlashPoint.DESCRIPTION: Add X{@@}{!M!|>0= + !M!} *Flame *Blessings into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FrostShard.NAME: Frost Shard
${ModID}:FrostShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Frost *Blessing{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:GaleForce.NAME: Gale Force
${ModID}:GaleForce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Gale *Blessing{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:Gambler.NAME: Gambler
${ModID}:Gambler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack enters your hand, ${ModID}:Sharpen it by 0 to !M! this combat.

${ModID}:HallowedGround.NAME: Hallowed Ground
${ModID}:HallowedGround.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Purity. NL Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:HeartGuard.NAME: Heart Guard
${ModID}:HeartGuard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Lightmare.NAME: Lightmare
${ModID}:Lightmare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL ${ModID}:Holy: ${ModID}:Corrupt.

${ModID}:MagicWall.NAME: Magic Wall
${ModID}:MagicWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${ModID}:ManaMaster.NAME: Mana Master
${ModID}:ManaMaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, gain !M! additional Energy.

${ModID}:Microcosm.NAME: Microcosm
${ModID}:Microcosm.DESCRIPTION: Choose any number of cards in your hand. Add a copy of them into your hand next turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Mindscape.NAME: Mindscape
${ModID}:Mindscape.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL If you have no *Miracles, add !${ModID}:M2! *Miracle{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} into your hand.

${ModID}:NullStar.NAME: Null Star
${ModID}:NullStar.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Attack{@@}{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand. NL {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 this turn. NL ${ModID}:Corrupt. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Oblation.NAME: Oblation
${ModID}:Oblation.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute: Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Parry.NAME: Parry
${ModID}:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL While held, the next time you are attacked, gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage back.

${ModID}:PenaltyOfDeath.NAME: Penalty of Death
${ModID}:PenaltyOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Die next turn.

${ModID}:PiercingArrow.NAME: Piercing Arrow
${ModID}:PiercingArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL ${ModID}:Holy: Costs 0.

${ModID}:ResoundingImpact.NAME: Resounding Impact
${ModID}:ResoundingImpact.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Holy: Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Serenity.NAME: Serenity
${ModID}:Serenity.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand next turn.

${ModID}:SnowStorm.NAME: Snow Storm
${ModID}:SnowStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Frost *Blessing{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:TempleWithin.NAME: Temple Within
${ModID}:TempleWithin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Unsainted.NAME: Unsainted
${ModID}:Unsainted.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for ALL of your Status cards.

${ModID}:Venerate.NAME: Venerate
${ModID}:Venerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand next turn.

${ModID}:WeaponFusion.NAME: Weapon Fusion
${ModID}:WeaponFusion.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! Attacks in your hand. NL Add a *Flame *Blessing with their combined damage into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Withstand.NAME: Withstand
${ModID}:Withstand.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Purity.
